meanings.sent1: She answered unhesitatingly when asked if she wanted to join the game.
meanings.sent2: He unhesitatingly jumped into the pool without checking the water temperature.
meanings.sent3: The cat unhesitatingly pounced on the toy mouse, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: The student's unhesitating commitment to studying paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter unhesitatingly rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: She spoke unhesitatingly during the presentation, impressing the audience with her confidence.
meanings.sent2: The athlete unhesitatingly sprinted towards the finish line, determined to win the race.
meanings.sent3: The comedian unhesitatingly delivered the punchline, causing the audience to burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His unhesitating decision to help his friend in need showed his true character.
meanings.sent5: The singer unhesitatingly hit the high note, showcasing her incredible vocal range.
